INSTALL_MSG: Thanks for installing my repo.  ninja is a cog for Marvel's Contest of Champions
NAME: ninja
SHORT: Collector Cogs designed for Alliance Management in Marvel's Contest of Champions
DESCRIPTION: This repo contains a suite of cogs designed to power an alliance collection, a RED instance. The mcoc-cogs provide character info, user roster management, and ally management for Marvel Contest of Champions.
